comments:
I am using M3.

Sometimes in open resource dialog (in java perspective) when I start entering a file name then I got following exception:
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Items filtering".
!STACK 0
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
	at java.util.LinkedHashMap$LinkedHashIterator.nextEntry(Unknown Source)
	at java.util.LinkedHashMap$ValueIterator.next(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.FilteredItemsSelectionDialog$ContentProvider.addHistoryItems(FilteredItemsSelectionDialog.java:1840)
	at org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.FilteredItemsSelectionDialog$FilterJob.filterContent(FilteredItemsSelectionDialog.java:1493)
	at org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.FilteredItemsSelectionDialog$AbstractFilterJob.internalRun(FilteredItemsSelectionDialog.java:1424)
	at org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.FilteredItemsSelectionDialog$AbstractFilterJob.doRun(FilteredItemsSelectionDialog.java:1386)
	at org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.FilteredItemsSelectionDialog$AbstractFilterJob.run(FilteredItemsSelectionDialog.java:1374)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)



It does not block me cause I still can search for particular resource.
Bug has been fixed since integration build I20061128.
